Hi, I'm Annabelle I'm a web developer focused on creating impactful designs for organizations in Johnson County. Beyond my work, you can often find me instructing Girls Who Code clubs at Whiteland elementary schools! Explore my portfolio below and feel free to reach out at annabellewhite633@gmail.com.
Free Period Products FreePeriodProducts is a crowd-sourced database of locations that give out free period products built with Ruby on Rails. I built it to address menstrual inequality accross the globe.
Johnson County Tower Defense In this project, I challenged myself to make a tower defense game with pure JavaScipt - no external libraries or frameworks! Players also learn interesting historical facts about Johnson County, Indiana.
Lab Website I designed the website for the lab I worked in during summer 2024 using vanilla HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
